meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characterized by papules.
meanings.sent1: Her skin had a papular rash after the allergic reaction.
meanings.sent2: The doctor identified the papular lesions on the patient's arm.
meanings.sent3: The papular spots on the cake made it look like a delicious polka-dotted treat.
meanings.sent4: The papular texture of the fabric felt rough against her skin.
meanings.sent5: The papular appearance of the plant's leaves made it easy to spot in the garden.

meanings.definition: Resembling a papule in appearance or texture.
meanings.sent1: The papular growth on the tree looked unusual compared to the others.
meanings.sent2: The artist used a special technique to create a papular effect on the painting.
meanings.sent3: The papular design on the shirt made it stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: Her hair had a papular look, adding a unique touch to her style.
meanings.sent5: The papular texture of the rock made it easy to grip during the climb.
